risks.evidence: That's too high. We budgeted eight hundred and still need onboarding help.

actions.text: Send one-year contract at $1000/month with capped overages
Cap overages at 20% and send weekly alerts
Include onboarding dates for next week

summary: Pricing negotiation where buyer pushes back on $1200/month Pro plan. Seller agrees to $1000/month with annual commitment, white-glove onboarding, and 20% overage cap. Contract to be sent with onboarding dates.
